title: Stylish City Stay in the Heart of Prague
description: Stay in the heart of one of Europe’s most exquisite cities with a stylish getaway at Park Inn Prague. Located in Prague’s beautiful second district, this chic hotel offers elegant rooms, fantastic facilities and easy access to everything the city has to offer. Indulge in a dreamy European escape with an automatic upgrade to a spacious Superior Room, one delicious three-course dinner, a cocktail, a welcome drink and daily buffet breakfast.

title: Stylish Boutique Stopover - Golden Key Prague
description: Step back in time but don’t scrimp on life’s luxuries with a stay at Golden Key Prague. Enjoy daily breakfast, coffee and cake in Cafe Designum, a bottle of wine on arrival and a one way transfer from the airport included in your package.

title: Brand-New Five-Star Prague Escape with Daily Breakfast
description: Stay in the heart of one of Europe’s most exquisite cities with a five-star getaway at the newly-opened Urban CRÈME. Located in Prague’s beautiful second district, this chic hotel offers elegant rooms, fantastic facilities and easy access to everything the city has to offer; not to mention stunning views over the lake. Indulge in a dreamy European escape with daily breakfast and toast to a fantastic getaway with a welcome bottle of wine on arrival.

title: Sophisticated Prague Old Town Escape with Daily Breakfast & Nightly Wine Tasting
description:
Stay at the heart of Prague at this chic retreat in the historic Old Town. Positioned near legendary landmarks including the Astronomical Clock and Charles Bridge, this hotel's location offers unparalleled access to the city’s rich history, vibrant culture and bustling nightlife. Each morning, savour a sumptuous breakfast at the stylish onsite restaurant before exploring the city's cobbled lanes, lined with charming boutiques and eateries.

After a day of sightseeing on a guided, English-speaking city tour (select packages only), retreat to the hotel's library for a quiet read, then familiarise yourself with local drops during a daily wine tasting at the sophisticated bar. Unwind in exclusive rooms, blending modern comfort with classic charm, and rejuvenate freely in the luxurious spa facilities.

title: Central Prague Stay with Guaranteed Room Upgrade & Daily Breakfast
description:
Modern charm meets mid-century design at Falkensteiner Hotel Prague, a luxurious boutique in the heart of one of Europe's most vibrant cities. The hotel is the perfect base to uncover the magic of past and present Prague: easily wander through the culture-rich Old Town, see a live show at the buzzing Wenceslas Square or savour a local brew at the Beer Museum. Indulge in a variety of Czech cuisine within chic interiors at the onsite restaurant, enjoy a signature cocktail made by professional bartenders within the hidden lush courtyards adjacent to The Monkey Bar or venture out to discover the city's world-famous dining scene.

If you're looking for adventure, explore the nearby Prague Castle, take a stroll along the sparkling Vltava River or even visit the famous Prague Astronomical Clock, a marvel of medieval engineering. For something a little slower-paced, but just as invigorating, step into the calm zone and pay a visit to the Acquapura City SPA for your choice of an exquisite collection of tailored treatments.

title: Sophisticated Prague Old Town Escape with Daily Breakfast & Nightly Wine Tastings
description:
Stay in the heart of Prague at this chic and luxurious retreat in the city's historic Old Town. Perfectly positioned near legendary landmarks like the Astronomical Clock and Charles Bridge, the hotel's location offers unparalleled access to the city’s rich history, vibrant culture and bustling nightlife. Each morning, savour a sumptuous buffet at BoHo Restaurant before exploring the city's cobbled lanes, lined with charming boutiques and eateries.

After a day of sightseeing, courtesy of an included guided city tour, retreat to the hotel's library for a quiet read or familiarise yourself with local drops during a daily wine tasting at the sophisticated bar. Unwind in exclusive rooms, blending modern comfort with classic charm, and rejuvenate freely in the luxurious spa facilities, or make time for a first-class treatment (surcharges apply).

title: Five-Star Historic Hotel Just Steps from Charles Bridge in the Heart of Prague
description: The Mozart Prague is a captivating historical gem that exudes timeless elegance and charm. Located in the heart of Prague, follow the steps of Mozart who was a regular guest, discover modern art exhibitions and be entertained by concerts, food, and culture. Situated steps from the Charles Bridge, this five-star hotel boasts amazing river-view rooms and romantic courtyards alongside its harmonious wellness centre and highest ranking restaurant in the Czech Republic.

title: 14th-Century Heritage Hideaway near Iconic Prague Castle
description: Discover Prague's famous landmarks from the Mandarin Oriental Prague, a sophisticated hotel built on the site of a 14th-century Dominican monastery. The hotel's history is evident through the high-gated walls, vaulted ceilings and period features - it's like taking a step back in time. Prague's most iconic sights are at your fingertips, including Charles Bridge and Prague Castle. When you're not exploring the town, enjoy summer nights on Spices Terrace with cocktails and dinner, indulge in a treatment in the spa (housed in a former chapel), or work out in the fitness centre.
offer_address: Nebovidská 459/1, Malá Strana, 118 00 Prague, Czech Republic

title: Top-Rated Boutique Prague Escape moments from the Old Town
description:
Discover the unique fairytale charm of Prague at the boutique BoHo Prague Hotel, rated among the top 10% of hotels on Tripadvisor. Located just steps from the Old Town Square, this luxury hotel places you within easy reach of top attractions including Prague Castle, Charles Bridge, St. Vitus Cathedral and Wenceslas Square. Fuel your sightseeing with the delicious local chimney cake, a hearty plate of dumplings or a refreshing beer from any of the nearby restaurants and cafés.

Once you’ve had your fill of the ‘Golden City’, return to your boutique retreat, offering gastronomic excellence at the onsite restaurant and a wellness area with gym, sauna and spa bath. Each room offers a superior level of modern comfort with stylish grey, cream and pastel interiors, LCD TV and high-speed Wi-Fi.

title: Five-Star Art Deco Heritage Hotel in Prague City Centre with Restaurant, Bar & Spa
description: Find yourself enraptured by Art Deco excellence with a stay at this prestigious Luxury Collection hotel in the heart of Prague. Step through the sophisticated marble foyer and be welcomed by an abundance of sparkling facilities, including a rejuvenating wellness area with a fitness centre and two massage rooms, the elegant Alcron restaurant serving authentic Czech cuisine and a moody cocktail bar showcasing a dazzling menu of unique cocktails and elusive spirits.

title: Centrally Located Art Nouveau-Style Prague Hotel with Rooftop Terrace
description:
Fall head over heels for Prague’s awe-inspiring architecture, fascinating history and, of course, its excellent beer, with an exquisite stay at Hermitage Prague Hotel. Built in 1907, the hotel has an Art Nouveau-style façade and is surrounded by enchanting cobblestone streets, quaint courtyards and beautiful medieval buildings, providing all the makings for an unforgettable escape within this magical city.

Rated within the top 10% of properties worldwide on Tripadvisor, the hotel offers elegant and contemporary rooms, providing a tranquil space to recharge after days exploring the City of a Hundred Spires. Marvel at the ancient Vyšehrad Castle, visit the lively Vltava riverbank, or venture to one of the city's dedicated absinthe bars. If you want to stay a little closer to home, get a taste of mouthwatering fare at the onsite restaurant, Type, or enjoy a cocktail at the rooftop terrace and soak up the expansive city views.

**Luxury Escapes inclusions (select packages):**

- Start with **daily breakfast** to fuel you for a day of exploration
- Enjoy a lazy morning with **guaranteed 2pm late checkout**
- Maximise your stay with **early check-in**, subject to availability

**Terrace Upgrade:** Upgrade to a Superior Room with Terrace to admire the gorgeous views of Prague from your own terrace.
